title: Forms: Managing the Security of a Form
body:
Forms: Managing the Security of a Form¶

To ensure the security of your form, a CAPTCHA field will be included by default.
To manage the security of a form, you will need to have navigated to the settings of the form. Refer here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Click Security

  2. Select or deselect Include CAPTCHA

  3. Click Done
